reviewText: I am an Instructor and will use this in my courses. This is an awesome dvd and I would recommend this to everyone.

The setup sections (family having a picnic) were so heavy handed and full of "matrix" pans that it was hard to concentrate on the more interesting aspects.

Not much full info, although some interesting period film of patients.  Rather "medical" type footage which may seem a bit unexpected and strong for many viewers.
